sentence: The image is an infographic titled "Canada's New Skilled Worker."
sentence_cn: 该图是一张名为“加拿大新兴技术工人”的信息图。

sentence: It outlines the criteria under the revised Federal Skilled Worker program, focusing on language proficiency, age, and work experience.
sentence_cn: 它概述了修订后的联邦技术工人计划的标准，重点关注语言能力、年龄和工作经验。

sentence: Key Sections:
sentence_cn: 关键部分：

sentence: 1. Title and Introduction:
sentence_cn: 1. 标题与简介：

sentence: - Title: "Canada's new SKILLED WORKER."
sentence_cn: - 标题：“加拿大的新技术工人。”

sentence: - Subtitle explains that the revised program emphasizes language proficiency, younger age, and full-time work experience.
sentence_cn: - 副标题解释称，修订后的计划强调语言能力、更低年龄和全职工作经验。

sentence: 2. Illustration:
sentence_cn: 2. 说明：

sentence: - Features a silhouette of a person wearing a white shirt and yellow hard hat, holding tools, symbolizing a skilled worker.
sentence_cn: - 以身穿白衬衫和黄色安全帽、手持工具的人的轮廓为特色，象征着一名技术熟练的工人。

sentence: 3. Criteria:
sentence_cn: 3. 标准：

sentence: - Age:
sentence_cn: - 年龄：

sentence: - 18-35 years, indicated by an hourglass icon.
sentence_cn: - 18-35 岁，以沙漏图标表示。

sentence: - Work Experience:
sentence_cn: - 工作经验：

sentence: - 6+ years full-time, illustrated by a briefcase.
sentence_cn: - 6 年以上全职工作，以公文包为例。

sentence: - Education:
sentence_cn: - 教育：

sentence: - Post-secondary credentials, with a graduation cap icon.
sentence_cn: - 大专学历，带有毕业帽图标。

sentence: - Language:
sentence_cn: - 语言：

sentence: - High proficiency in English and French, indicated by speech bubbles with "Hello! Bonjour!" text.
sentence_cn: - 熟练掌握英语和法语，通过带有“你好！Bonjour！”文字的对话框来表明。

sentence: - Adaptability:
sentence_cn: -适应性：

sentence: - Previous work or study in Canada.
sentence_cn: - 之前在加拿大工作或学习过。

sentence: - Relatives in Canada, shown with a house icon.
sentence_cn: - 加拿大的亲戚，以房屋图标表示。

sentence: - Arranged offer of employment, represented by a handshake icon.
sentence_cn: - 已安排的工作机会，以握手图标表示。

sentence: 4. Contact Information:
sentence_cn: 4.联系方式：

sentence: - For more info, directs to "FWCANADA" with contact details including a phone number and website.
sentence_cn: - 如需更多信息，请直接联系“FWCANADA”，其中包含电话号码和网站等联系方式。

sentence: The color scheme includes shades of blue, white, and black, with a clean and organized layout.
sentence_cn: 配色方案包括蓝色、白色和黑色，布局简洁有序。
